title: Bug 17825: ControlExampleText beeps when I choose SWT.MULTI
description: Bug 17825: ControlExampleText beeps when I choose SWT.MULTI. Somehow I don't think it's supposed to do that.
OB: When selecting the SWT.MULTI option in ControlExampleText, the system emits a beeping sound. Additionally, clicking on other buttons also triggers the same beeping sound.
EB: I expect the system to not produce any sound when selecting the SWT.MULTI option or clicking on other buttons. There should be no bell sound indicating an incorrect action.
SR:
To reproduce the issue: 
1. Open the ControlExampleText. 
2. Select the SWT.MULTI option. 
3. Click on other buttons in the ControlExampleText.
